duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in delivery and management of engagement activities related to healthcare enterprise portfolio strategy, design, and delivery
Partner with others to develop relationships across engagement team
Guide client and internal subject matter expert conversations on capital planning towards effective outcomes
Create compelling deliverables that engages technical and non-technical audiences to drive responsible decisions in long-term capital planning at every level of a client’s organization
Identify and mitigate projects risks around scope, schedule, and quality, effectively escalating to engagement leadership
Develop strategies and solutions to solve complex capital planning challenges for healthcare clients

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree, preference for Master’s degree in a related field
